description: This is a TsSeduction.com classic shoot from the archive featuring the hung and sexy, Sasha Strokes. Scott agrees to be the lookout while his "buddies" rob a liquor store. His ass and mouth will learn the lesson for him as Sasha Strokes whips out her 10 inch, thick cock and delivers some amazing fucking. She plows him in every corner of his cell including the toilet.
title: Classic Shoot: Ts Sasha Strokes & her TEN inches of Law and Order
